https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yzShpEZ9DDXNtDAycLVgFmXms0y.jpg How African artists have spread African culture all over the world, especially music, since the harsh years of decolonization, trying to offer a nicer portrait of this amazing continent, historically known for tragic subjects, such as slavery, famine, war and political chaos.
